title: [Marienna's Market, Balcony]
description: A shelf has been carved out of the surrounding rockface and serves as a small balcony overlooking much of Kharam-Dzu to the east and south.  Towards the north, the lush jungle of growth climbing the foothills almost detracts from the angry volcano, its towering peak often shrouded with misty clouds.

A shelf has been carved out of the surrounding rockface and serves as a small balcony overlooking much of Kharam-Dzu to the east and south.  Towards the north, the angry volcano is backlit at night with a fiery glow created by surrounding lava flow rivulets.
